title: SmartView
summary: From your mobile and wear device, you can control your presentation anytime.

descriptionHTML:
For most people,deliver a presentations is no small task. So, we want make it as easy and convenient as possible. From your mobile and wearable device, you can access and control your presentation anytime.

This easily manageable app allows you to keep your finger on the pulse of your presentation. Never again will you miss a slide. Stay on top of your business affairs whether you in the office, traveling between clients, or on a much needed vacation.

Download the Desktop companion app at http://www.smartview.watch

Android App Features (Free):

Bluetooth Connection & ​Wifi Connection
​Next , Prev & Close Commands
Open Recent Files
Wear Support for Moto 360
Wear Next, Prev & Close Commands
​
Android App Features (1 USD):

Bluetooth Connection​ & Wifi Connection​
Next , Prev & Close Commands
Open Recent Files
Wear Support for Moto 360
Wear Next, Prev & Close Commands
Mobile Virtual Pointer
Wear Open Recent Files
Wear Gestures for Next & Prev Commands
recentChanges: * Fixed a bug in Bluetooth devices selection
